The desire of coming out from that place was great but he was too afraid of going. After thinking over and over again, he decided to try it.

The next day he was ready, he was holding his sword in one hand and got a wooden stick in the other. He knew he wasnt equipped with the best weapons but at least he felt secure with it.

William began to walk to the Hill outside the city thinking where should he start his journey...

1) Stay away of Slimes the tend to go inside you, filling you so much that you actually might explode
2)Don't get close to the Syrup Vines, they trap you and feed you until you burst

With this in mind William reached a clear and in the middle of it, a rabbit girl about his age, being force-fed by a Syrup Vine. The girl was actually cute, she was a chubby blondie with a normal height and some beautiful almond eyes.But now her belly was getting bigger and bigger over the time and she was turning into a Syrup filled balloon. Her arms and legs where sinking in her rounding body and it seems she was... liking it? She was blushing and there was that little smile in her face... yeah, she WAS enjoying it. And Will thought she was actually looking hot like that.

But William didn't know what to do... if he tries to save her he might get trapped by the vine and that was the end for his Adventure but in the other he could just watch, let the girl explode and steal whatever she was carrying...

"Heeheehee! You're no longer the skinny boy I first met." Polly said.
"Well I could say the same about you." Will said. "Come on. Let's get going."
"Okay." Polly said.

So now Will and Polly decided to go out and.....
1111121111211.title: Find where Polly is.

11111211112111.content:
It was really getting close to sunset, so Will and Polly want to get some supplies before it got late. The two head to a store that sold a variety of stuff. Including armor, healing potions, and some magic items. This included stretchy fruit and the digestion potion that Polly use.

"Hey! This place sells stretchy fruit and those potions." Will said.
"Yeah. I got the stretchy fruit from here." Polly said. "As for the potions, I'm a provider for them here."
"Really?" Will said surprised.
"I had to make money some way." Polly said. "I actually come here once a week to offer them my potions."
"Huh." Will said.

The two get greeted by a squirrel.

"Hello travelers!" The squirrel said. "Oh. It's you. The young lady."
"Hi." Polly said.
"Seems like a put on a few since the last time I saw yo." The squirrel said.
"It was bound to happen." Polly said.
"We're just here to get some things." Will said.
"Okay. Feel free to get what you need." The squirrel said.

So the two got three stretchy fruits, three medium potions, a new shield, a large bagpack, and a few stuff for potion making. All the supplies reduce Will's coins stash to 30 coins. But it was still good that he bought all the stuff he did.

"Okay. I think that's all we need." William said. "Okay. Let's get going."
"Alright." Polly said.

The two then leave the shop with all the things they got. Will notice all the interesting items Polly bought.

"You have a lot of ingredient there." William said.
"I need them to make more of the insta-digesting potion." Polly said.
"Ah. So you are really good at making potions, huh?" Will said.
"I'm not just a pretty face." Polly said winking.
"So, do you want to head to my place?" Will asked.
"Sure." Polly said. "I could use a break."

So Will and Polly head to Will's little house. Will open the door with his key and let Polly inside the living room.

"It's not much, but it's home." Will said.
"You live on your own?" Polly asked.
"Since my dad died." Will responded.
"Sorry to hear." Polly said before sitting on the couch.
"It's okay." Will said. "Just feel free to get comfy and make yourself at home."
"Okay." Polly said. "Hey, if you are still feeling peckish, I can make some more goodies."

Will still felt kinda full from all the food he had at the restaurant. Did he had any room for some of Polly's sweets?
11111211112111.title: Buy some supplies and head to Will's house.

111112111121111.content:
"I suppose some more treats wouldn't hurt." William said.
"Excellent." Polly said. "Let me call my magic servants to feed you again."

So like last time, Polly summoned small bunny-like spirits to offer foods. Again, it was all sweets, but instead of just cake, they were also pie, cookies and doughnuts. Also like last time, Will couldn't help but dig in. He enjoyed the triple glazed doughnuts.

"These are so good." Will said before going to try some more cake.

Like last time, Polly used magic to the sweets super tasty, but extra fattening. So the pounds were already piled up on Will's belly. He was started to get full, but still had a few more pieces of pie. Polly had a few pieces herself. Not as much as Will, but still quite a lot a few pieces. After a while, they were full. Will's belly was really starting to get large. He was getting close to catching up with Polly's weight now.

"So...full." Will said while the spirits rubbed his belly.
"Seems like you are getting use to being fat." Polly said.
"Well that Tyson guy was right about training my stomach." Will said. "Odds our, I wouldn't make it far being thin."
"Haha. I couldn't agree more." Polly said. "I did like the feeling of getting inflated by the syrup vines."
"By the way, how about tell me why you needed the syrupy bulb?" Will asked.
"I told you. I'm not tell." Polly said.
"Guess I have to figure it out." Will said.

The thing about William, is that he pretty smart. So he thought about everything and about Polly.

"When we were in the forest, you mention something about the syrup vine properties." Will said. "The only properties I know of the syrup is the sugars and getting fat from them. So the syrupy bulb should had some of those properties. You are also pretty good at making potions, being an witch apprentice. So that means...you want to use the syrupy bulb for a weight gaining potion."
"H...how did you know?" Polly said shocked that Will guessed right.
"I'm more than just a handsome face." Will said smirking.
"Guess there is no point in hiding it from you." Polly said. "Yes. I needed to syrupy bulb to help me develop a weight gain potion. I still need to work on the components."
"Well I hope you can do it." Will said.
"Thanks." Polly said smiling.
"Well it's getting late. We should get some rest." Will said. "Hope you don't crashing on the couch."
"I don't." Polly said. "I had to start working on some potions. Goodnight!"
"Night!" Will said before heading to his room.

He lay down on his bed which was having issues holding him due to his new found weight. But it still hold him. Marshall notice how much his belly bloated up.

"Man, I really put on the weight now." Will said. "Train my body and my stomach. Should I help that Tyson then?"

While thinking about everything, he went to sleep. The next morning....
111112111121111.title: Give in to Polly's magic treats.

choices: "Let's help the guy fight the witch."
"I need more time to think about it."
1111121111211111.content:
It was morning and Will was still snoozing in his bed. What woke him up was the scent of a sweet aroma in the air. Then he happen to hear Polly call him.

"Will! Are you up yet?" Polly asked. "I made breakfast."
"Okay. I'm coming." Will said.

Will got out of bed and then started to look at his body. He realized that he has gained quite a lot. He was looking close to over 400 pounds now. He has gained quite a lot for a short time, yet he was quite okay with it.

"Man, I'm getting pretty big now." Will said to himself. "How much bigger am I gonna get? I'll worry about it later. Right now, I'm starving."

Will went in the other room and on the table was a big breakfast. A few large stacks of pancakes with syrup, a plate of cinnamon rolls, and some maple sausage links. Polly was looking cheery.

"Good morning sleepy head." Polly said. "Hope you're hungry cause I made plenty. Even made you some links. Through I'm not really a meat person."
"This all looks good." Will said happily. "Did you make all of this with your magic?"
"Yeah." Polly said.
"So it's gonna have the same effect as your cakes." Will said.
"Yeah...." Polly said. "They can be a bit fattening, but still really tasty."
"Alright. Can't let it all go to waste." Will said.

Will and Polly began to eat the food on the table. They started with the pancakes. They were really fluffy and the syrup was perfect. Will then ate some of the sausage links. Polly ate the most cinnamon rolls. Barely leaving any for Will. After a while, all the food was eaten and both of them were full now. Both of their bellies expanded a bit. Polly was still a little bigger than Will. The two of the just laid on the couch to digest.

"That was as good as your other stuff." Will said.
"My magic comes in handy, does it?" Polly said.

Will nodded. Polly then notice how big her and Will were getting. She then went to Will and rubbed his belly for a bit. Will found it soothing, so he allowed it.

"Getting a little big there, are we?" Polly said with a smile.
"It was bond to happen." Will said. "Besides, that Tyson guy was right. I do need to train my stomach as well."
"Does that mean you want to help him?" Polly asked.
"Have you decided?" Will asked.
"I think we should." Polly said. "It might be tough, but I think we can do it."
"Hmmmm...." Will thought.
"So, should we help him?" Polly asked.

Will thought about it and decided...
1111121111211111.title: Polly cooked up some breakfast.

choices: Let's get some more stuff first.
11111211112111111.content:
"It might be tough, but I think we should go help Tyson." Will said. "He says he wants to stop this witch, so let's help him."
"Yes. I agree the same way." Polly said.
"He said that he would be the Training Grounds until 10:00 am." Will said. "It's not too far from my house and we still have some time. So let's just sit back and... digest for now."
"Okay." Polly said.

After a while, the two collected their supplies and headed to the Training Grounds to meet up with Tyson the wolf. They spotted Tyson swinging his giant ax around. But they also notice something about him. It looked like Tyson had gained some more weight than the last time. At first, Tyson looked around 900 pounds. But now he was looking around 1500 pounds. His belly was bigger and close to touching the ground. He must have done a lot of eating since he came into town.

"Hey. Tyson!" Will shouted at him.
"Well well. Will and Polly, right? Looks like you two came after all." Tyson said as he stopped swinging his ax. "Oh. And it looks like you two took my advice."
"Kinda." Will said. "But look at you. Your stomach was not that large yesterday."
"I did some eating." Tyson said. "I went to a diner and had the "Way too much food" meal."
"Say what?" Will said shocked. "That's like everything on the menu. Most people who eat all that end up in the hospital."
"Well I'm not most people." Tyson stated. "My stomach is quite strong. Like I told you, train you body and stomach as well."
"Uh huh." Will said nodding.
"So, you said you need our help to fight this evil witch from stuffing people and eating them?" Polly asked.
"Yes. The witch has been causing a lot of trouble for travelers." Tyson said. "I want to bring that to an end. Oh and the reward money isn't too bad either. 9,000 gold."
"Woah!" William and Polly said surprised.
"That's some pretty good amount of cash." Will said.
"I could buy soooooo much with that." Polly stated.
"Help me out and I'll split the money with you." Tyson said.
"For that amount, I'm in." Will said.
"Me too." Polly said.
"Great!" Tyson said smiling. "Now, the forest is treacherous with it's slime creatures, syrup vines and other creatures. Do you have everything you need? If so, we can go now. But if you need some more stuff, it can wait tell then."

So Will needed to decide. Did they have everything they needed or should they get a few more things with the little bit of cash they had left.
11111211112111111.title: "Let's help the guy fight the witch."

111112111121111111.content:
"We already got what we need. So we are ready as we'll ever be." Will said.
"Alright then. Let's get going, shall we?" Tyson said.

The three made started walking as they made their way to the entrance of the forest. Before they went into the forest, Tyson wanted to give them some warnings.

"You said that you two have been here before, right?" Tyson asked.
"Uh huh. It's where we met." Polly said.
"What did you happen to encounter?" Tyson asked.
"Just some syrup vines." Will said.
"Well from what I heard, there are also fat wolves, obese bears, and of course lime slime." Tyson said. "The slimes are very common here. Hints the names. They are usually pretty easy to handle by fighting them or eating them. Just be sure to have a strong stomach."
"Got it." Will said.
"Now the witch's house is somewhere deep in this forest." Tyson said. "Don't know where, but it's suppose to be some place deep."
"Let's hope we don't get lost." Polly said.
"Now, let's go." Tyson said.
"Right." Will and Polly said.

The three then headed into the forest. They walked through the trees and bushes for a while til he encountered...
111112111121111111.title: To The Slimy Forest.

choices: Embrace the slime and see if he could handle it.
Cut at it with his sword and finish it off.
1111121111211111111.content:
A medium sized green slime faced them.

"Woah!" Will shouted surprised. "Is that a..."
"A slime creature, yes." Tyson said. "A lime one to be exact."
"If I remember right, slime creatures are consider to be some of the weakest type of monsters. But they are also known to bloat up travelers." Polly said.
"So... we should take this thing out, right?" Will asked while getting out his sword.
"Normally yes. But uhhhh....." Tyson said.
"But uhhhhhh?" Will said looking confused at Tyson.
"How about you take care of this yourself?" Tyson asked.
"By myself?" Will said.
"This seems like the perfect way to evaluate your skills and see what you're made of." Tyson said.
"He's right. You are 'Mr. Inexperienced' after all." Polly said to Will.
"Like you have that much experience under your belt." Will stated to Polly. "But you're right. If I can't beat a weak slime monster, how am I gonna handle a evil witch?"

William tightly held his sword and face the slime.

"Bring it on, you blob." Will said to the slime.
"That's the spirit, kid." Tyson said.
"Go Will!" Polly said cheering for Will.

Will charged at the slime and slashed at it. It seemed to had did a bit of damage to it, but not enough to make it noticable. The slime then stretched out and went for Will's mouth. Will was being stuffed by the limed flavored slime. Will didn't know what to do next. The slime could fill him up to the point of popping. Will decided to
1111121111211111111.title: A lime slime.

choices: The party encounters a pack of wolves.
11111211112111111111.content:
The lime slime continue to go into Will's mouth and into his stomach. Will just let it happen to see if he could take it. If his stomach couldn't handle this, how will he be able to handle other stuff. Will's belly started to stretch out more and more. Polly and Tyson were starting to get concern.

"Should we do something?" Polly asked worried for Will.
"Not yet. Let's see how he does." Tyson said to Polly.

More and more of the slime continue to make it's way into Will's stomach. Bigger and bigger Will's stomach got. But Will didn't let up. After a minute or so, the slime all made it into Will's belly. It wasn't the BEST way to beat a slime, but at least beat it. All the slime sloshed inside Will's belly. Will had to laid down on the floor for a while.

"BUUUUURRPPP!!!" Will belched loudly.
"Will! You okay?" Polly said as she walks to his side.
"Yeah. I'm just a little more full than I thought I would be." Will said.
"Well at least you didn't explode. Nice job, kid." Tyson said.
"Th...anks..." Will said as his stomach violently sloshes up and down. "Ugh! My stomach."
"Do you want the digestion potion?" Polly asked.
"Just let him digest this naturally." Tyson said. "Can you do that, Will?"
"Sure..." Will said with his hands on his stomach.

Polly then rubbed Will's belly a bit to make him feel better.

"Better?" Polly asked with a smile.
"A little." Will said.
"Alright. Rest a few and let's continue moving." Tyson told them.

A few minutes later, Will and the others walked around a bit more in the forest. After a while, it was started to get dark and...
11111211112111111111.title: Embrace the slime and see if he could handle it.

111112111121111111111.content:
Will, Polly, and Tyson stop at a clear part in the forest.

"It's starting to get dark." Tyson said. "Let's set up camp here and continue tomorrow."
"Okay." Will and Polly said.

The group toke their bags off and began taking out their supplies.

"The tent might be too small for all of us. Especially the way we all are now." Will said.
"I think you're right. My tent may not cut it anymore." Polly said.
"Don't worry. I got a tent that should solve that problem." Tyson said.

Tyson then got out what looked like a giant roll of fabric. He threw it on the ground and in an instant, a giant tent formed in front of them.

"Woah!" Will shouted surprised.
"A tent that pitches itself? Amazing!" Polly said.
"There's more. Take a look inside." Tyson said.

Will and Polly looked inside the tent and their jaws dropped. Now only was the preset with lanterns, bedding, and a kitchen area, but the tent was waaaaaaaaaaay bigger on the inside. Like big enough to hold 30 more people.

"What the heck?!? This can't be real. It's bigger on the inside instead of the outside." Will stated.
"I get it. So this is a magic tent." Polly said.
"You pick up on things fast." Tyson said to Polly. "Yep. This is a magic tent. Not only does it set up on it own and is bigger on the inside, but it can also accommodate to any size that tenants are. It's also fire-proof, water-proof, heavy-weather proof and repels monsters."
"Wow. So it's like the tent of all tents." Will said.
"Pretty much." Tyson said.
"A tent like this most not have been cheap." Polly said.
"It wasn't. Almost went broke buying this thing. But it was totally worth the money." Tyson said. "Only by being a bounty hunter was I able to pay for it."
"Maybe I should be one." Will said.
"Ehh. You're still wet behind the ears." Tyson said to Will.
"Heeeeyy." Will said not looking too happy from Tyson's comment.
"Alright. Let's finish making camp." Tyson said.
"Kay." Will and Polly said.

After a few minutes, the party finished and setted up a fire. The three of them all sat down on the ground looking at the fire. Will looked at himself. It seemed after eating that slime, his weight is about the same as Polly's. Maybe a bit more.

"So... is anyone hungry? I can conjure us a little something." Polly said.
"Creating food with magic? Sounds incredible." Tyson said.

If Polly was gonna make food, there will be a fattening side effect like the other times.
111112111121111111111.title: The party sets up camp.

choices: The group continued their search for the witch.
1111121111211111111111.content:
"Sure." Will said.
"I could eat." Tyson said.
"Great. I'll summon us up some cake." Polly said.
"Ehhhh...." Will and Tyson said not sounding to fond of cake.
"What's wrong?" Polly asked them.
"It's just that... can you conjure us something OTHER than sweets?" Will asked.
"I'm not much of a sweet guy. Can you at least make us some meat?" Tyson asked.
"Yeah. Some meat." Will said.
"*sigh* You know, being a bunny, meat is the last thing on my mind." Polly stated. "But... I'll see what I can do for the two of you."

Polly waved her wand and summon giant roasted turkey legs for both William and Tyson. They were about the size of regular turkey.

"Fraid that's all I can do." Polly said.
"You kidding. This look amazing." Tyson said.
"That... and it's the biggest turkey legs I've ever seen." Will said.

The two quickly started to eat away at the turkey legs. Polly just summon a couple of cakes for herself. As they ate, the magic from the food added some more pounds to each of them. They also decided to talk a bit.

"So... Will and Polly. How about you tell me a bit about yourselves." Tyson asked.
"Oh. You want to know about us a bit?" Will asked.
"Now that you mention it, Will and I don't much about each other either." Polly said. "Which is surprising since we have been together for a while."
"Oh yeah. I don't really know anything about you, Polly. Except that you are a witch in training." William stated.
"How about this? We each say a few things about each other here and now." Tyson suggested.
"Alright. I'll go first." Will said. "Honestly... I never done any traveling before up until a few days ago. I lived in the village with my dad til he died protecting our village. The only weapon I have is a sword, which was pretty rusty. But thanks to Polly, it's far from rusty now. After recent events, I went from being skinny to having a lot more around the waist." Will said as he lifted his belly then dropped it as it plopped up and down. "But I'm not complaining. I'm actually okay with the weight now."
"Skinny is overrated anyway." Polly said. "Now for me. As you already know, I'm an apprentice witch, but I know all the basic spells. I was trained with a few other students in the magic guild on the moutains. For a while, I just stayed at the guild and studied. Up until recently, I decided to go out and see the land for myself. I... was also curious about everything. You know... with food and junk. Guess it shows with all the weight I've been putting on."
"Guess you weren't always on the heavy side either." Tyson said.
"Well what about you, Tyson?" Will asked.

Tyson finished off his turkey leg before he spoke.

"Believe it or not, I wasn't always this massive wolf you see." Tyson said. "About two months ago, I was mostly guess muscle. Like most of the people in my village. I didn't even plan to be a one ton wolf."
"You didn't?" William said looking surprised.
"It happen when I started bounty hunting. After dealing with slime monsters, giant foods, heavy meals, meat monsters, and candy people.... the pounds just added on and on."
"Haha! That figures." Will said.
"So you never tried to lose the weight?" Polly asked.
"I did at first, but after a while... being fat just made things easier." Tyson said.
"What do you mean?" Will asked.
"Have you seen people lately? Hardly anyone is skinny anymore. Most of them are even fatter then we are." Tyson said. "Also, being fat seems to be the best way to survive these days. Remember what I told you."
"Train our bodies and our stomachs." Will answered.
"Right. The stronger the stomach, the easier it will be to handle anything that comes your way. Also a lesser chance of popping." Tyson said.
"Right. Cause I almost popped two times already." Polly admitted.
"Don't worry. We're take your advice to heart." Will said.
"Good." Tyson said. "Alright, it's late. Let's get some sleep so we can have plenty of energy to face the witch."
"Yes sir." Will and Polly said while pumping their fists.

Polly put the fire out with a water spell and everyone went into the tent. They laid on their bedding, put on some covers and began to drift asleep. The next morning...
1111121111211111111111.title: Have some dinner.

choices: Started eating pieces of the house.
11111211112111111111111.content:
It was morning and the group has woken up. After putting up the tent and supplies, they went back on the hunt for the witch. The party walks around the forest for a while and faced of against obese wolves and bears. But so fair, no sight of the witch's house.

"We've been searching for a long time. I'm starting to wonder if this evil witch is actually real." Polly said in a fret.
"She's real. Trust me on this." Tyson said to Polly.
"So... what kind of place are we suppose to be looking for to find her? Some creepy looking house in the middle of the forest?" Will asked.
"Most likely. I'm not so sure myself." Tyson admitted.
"Ugggggghh!!! We are gonna be walking around this forest forever." Polly said complaining.

As Polly mopped, she started smelling something. Something sweet. William and Tyson started to smell the scent as well.

"Guys? Do you smell that aroma?" Polly asked them.
"Yeah I smell it." Will said.
"Me too." Tyson said. "It's comkng from that direction."

So the group ran to follow the sweet aroma and to their surprise, the three all spotted a huge gingerbread house. Like in the fairy tales. The house looked completely made of gingerbread and holded together with white frosting. There were also peppermints around the walls, gumdrops, red licorice, candy canes, and a bunch of other sweet junk. It was a sight to behold. Polly seemed the most in awe.

"Woah! An actual gingerbread house." Polly said happily. "I never seen something so amazing."
"This must be where the witch lives." Tyson stated.
"You sure about that?" Will asked.
"Haven't your parents read you that story? Evil witch. Gingerbread house. Fattens up kids. Tries to eat them. It's pretty self-explainatory." Tyson stated.
"Fair enough." Will said. "So what should we do? Do we just head inside?"

As Will and Tyson tried to come up with a plan, Polly....
11111211112111111111111.title: The group continued their search for the witch.

choices: Their eyes glowed and and went on a uncontrollable feeding frenzy.
They stopped because they were full.
111112111121111111111111.content:
Polly pulled out a piece of gingerbread from the wall and started eating it. Will and Tyson were shocked by this.

"Polly! What are you doing?" Will shouted out at Polly.
"Don't just eat a piece of the house." Tyson shouted out.
"What?" Polly said as she was still chewing on the gingerbread. "It's really good. You should try some."

Polly pulled out a big gumdrop from the house and gulped it down. Tyson and Will were starting to get concern.

"I REALLY think you shouldn't be eating pieces of the witch's house. For all you know, it's cursed or something." Tyson said.
"Doesn't taste cursed to me." Polly said as she eats more pieces from the house.
"It does all look delicious. Maybe just a few bites." Will said.

Will took a piece of gingerbread from the wall and started eating it. It was really tasty.

"Mmm. You were right." Will said to Polly.
"Let's dig in some more." Polly said agreeing.

So Polly and Will continued to eat more pieces from the house. Tyson was started to be concern.

"Kids, I REALLY think you should both take it easy on those." Tyson said.

Polly then broke off a gumdrops and stuff it into Tyson's mouth.

"Aww. Quit being a drag and try this already." Polly said.

Tyson shallowed the gumdrop and even a person with a small sweet tooth would like it.

"I... suppose we can eat a bit." Tyson said now addicted.
"That's more like it." Polly said happy that Tyson caved in.

So now Will, Polly, and Tyson began eat parts of the candy house. Eating the gingerbread walls, candy canes, licorice, gumdrops, and anything else. All their bellies started swelling up from all the sugar. But the weirdest thing was, each piece they ate from the house just grew back. Yet, Will and the others did seem to notice... or care. Then, as they contined to eat....
111112111121111111111111.title: Started eating pieces of the house.

choices: In a steel cage with the others.
1111121111211111111111111.content:
Something weird started happening to Will, Polly, and Tyson. Their eyes all started glowing green and they started saying "More."

The three then rapidly scarfed down more parts of the house. It was like the three of them couldn't control themselves. They all just wanted to eat and eat. Ripping off more and more pieces from the house and scarfed it all down their gullets. Soon, their bellies started expanding outward. They were all even getting so stuffed that their bellies began touching the ground. Will and the others started feeling really full, yet they were still cursed. So they continued eating more and more.

After about an hour, Will, Polly, and Tyson were beyond full. Will was now around 1300 pounds, Polly was 1100 pounds and Tyson was 1700 pounds. All of them swayed left and right, looking unwell.

"So.... full...." Will said looking sick.
"Ate.... too.... much...." Polly said looking sick as well.
"Feel.... too...." Tyson said looking as bad as Will and Polly.

At that moment, Will, Polly, and Tyson all blacked out and fell to the ground. They were all out cold. Too full to wake up or do anything.

Later, Will finally wakes up. But finds out he's....
1111121111211111111111111.title: Their eyes glowed and and went on a uncontrolla...

choices: Was still hypnotized and wanted more.
Tried to resist and snap out of it.
11111211112111111111111111.content:
Will realized that he was inside a steel cage floating from the ground by steel chains in a room he wasn't familiar with. It had a "witchy" feeling because of the dread looking wall and black cauldron.

"Where am I?" Will asked himself.
"Will!" Shouted out a voice.

It was Polly from another cage. Tyson was also in a another cage from the room. As well as a sleeping obese female dragon with silver scales.

"Guys!" Will said glad to see his friends.
"Well.... looks like the witch trapped us." Tyson stated. "Told you that eating parts of the house was a bad idea."
"Sorry." Polly said feeling bad.
"Now it looks like the witch has captured us." Tyson said. "Just... great."
"What do we do now?" Will asked.
"Now.... we have to wait for the witch." Tyson said with his pudgy arms crossed.

Seeking of the devil, a green hunched over horse enters the basement. Judging by the black robes and pointy hat, she had to be the witch.

"Greetings my little piggies." The horse witch said in a high pitched voice. "My, ten walks over Will and grab his gut. "You are practically skin and bones, boy! All of you are. I just have to fatten you all up!"

The party didn't seem to like that idea. If what Tyson said was true, the witch was fatten them up so she coul eat them. That... would be bad. The witch summoned a large white cake. Three slices levitated up in the air and floats towards their faces.

"Now open wide." The witch said with a grin.

The cake slices each got crammed into their mouths. They reflexively ate the cakes and found them overly sweet and rich. The witch then gave them more cake and each of them forcefully ate each slice. Once again, all of their eyes were glowing green again. They were hypnotized.

"Ready for seconds?" The witch the party with a devious grin. The party simply nodded their heads. She then stuffed Will and the others with more and more cakes. They all ate the cake as if they haven't eaten at all shallowing whole wedges. They belly stretched out more and more until they weight doubled in size. They were all over a ton now. Yet the witch didn't seem done yet.

"Well, feels like you all got plenty of room left in there, eh my little piglets?" The witch asked sarcastically.

The party....
11111211112111111111111111.title: In a steel cage with the others.

111112111121111111111111111.content:
They all nod emphatically and open their mouths wide again. The witch laughs as she summoned a large plate of chocolate chip cookies.

"Ready for the next course?" The witch asked sarcastically.

Soon, Will and the others were stuffed with dozen of cookies and crammed them into their mouths. After a while, they shallow down the last bite and each of ther belly bulged out even more the witch walks up and squeezes Will's overstuffed belly again.

"Might, aren't you all quite the bottomless pits?" The witch asked. "Especially you, little fox." Will and the others could only nod absent mindedly. Still hypnotized, they opened their mouths wanting more. "Let's see if we can fill you all up."

The witch then summoned 3 glass jugs of chocolate syrup over app their heads. They all tilted over their heads back and open their mouths wide as the jug tip over and started dumping huge blobw of chocolate syrup down their throats. They forcefully gulped down gallons and gallons and gallons of thr syrup. Their bellies swelled up so much that their were each filling up the cages and oozes around the bars. They were all so full that they could explode. They were each at least over 4000lbs now. The witch stopped pouring syrup into them.

"Are my piglets nice and full?" The witch asked. All they could do is nod. Each of their bellies groaned from all the eating. "Do you all have tummy aches?" The all nodded again.

The witch then summoned magical hands that rubbed the bellies of Will, Polly, and Tyson. The hands started squishing and rubbing all over. They feel a gurgling and rolling sensation in their stomachs. They all looked down and see that their bellies shrank as their bodies slowly but steadily inflates with fat. The party was now close to whale-like.

"There. Just how growing piglets should look." The witch said proud of herself. "Now that you had enough...." The witch then had a devious grin on her face. "... it's time for my dinner."

The witch waved her hands and the bottoms from Will, Polly, and Tyson's disappeared and the three fell on their butts. Lucky for them, it snapped them all out of the hypnosis.

"Owwwww!" Will and the others said.
"Is everyone alright?" Will asked.
"For now. The witch is about to eat us." Tyson shouted.
"Heheheh" The witch cackled. "You catch on fast. But you're a little late." The witch glared at Will. "I'll believe I'll start with the fox first."
"Oh no!" Will said looking scared.

If Will didn't act quick, he was going spend a trip in the witch's belly. It was also hard to move with his extra weight. With only seconds to act, Will....
111112111121111111111111111.title: Was still hypnotized and wanted more.

choices: Will finished her with a great slash.
Polly took the witch out with a water spell.
1111121111211111111111111111.content:
"Of course." Will thought.

He quickly reached out for his potion and drank it down. Before the witch finished her spell, for a split second, Will went skinny again. He quickly cartwheeled out of the way of the witch's spell. Then his body went back to being heavily obese. But now most of his fat from his massive feast was converted all over his body. So once again, he was a 2 ton fox with a belly that touched the ground. But at least he could be could move better. He then got his sword out.

"Heh." Will said getting ready to fight.
"What?" The witch said stunned.
"The potions. Duh." Polly said remembering they have those. "Tyson!!!"
"Already on it." Tyson said getting out his potion.

Both Polly and Tyson drank their potions like William did. Also like Will, their bodies went thin for a split second. The next second, they exploded with the fat they had spread all over their bodies. Both were still quite obese, but at least they could move better. Now Tyson got his ax out and Polly got her wand out. Ready for action.

"Okay witch, time for payback." Tyson said.
"Yeah." Polly said ready.
"Hmpt! So this is the thanks I get for all the hospitality I gave you." The witch said.
"You wanted to eat us." Will stated.
"No matter. I'll just had to stuff you up some more." The witch said with a grin.

The battle with the witch began. The witch used her magic to conjure sweets again. A bunch of cakes and cookies. With their now empty stomachs, they could handle it. But they all thought it would be a good idea to avoid eating too much of them. The witch launched cakes at William and the others, but Polly burn them to a crisp with a fire spell.

"How dare you." The witch said angrily.
"*sigh* I hate ruining desserts." Polly said not really happy.
"Cry about it later." Tyson said. "Got a witch to defeat."

Tyson seem to have better control of his weight than Will and Polly. So moving wasn't much of a problem. He attack the witch with a strike from his ax, but the witch dodged it. She then stuffed Tyson's mouth with a piece of cake. Tyson was still fine. William then went in for an attack. He was able to get a few slashes in with his sword. But the witch was still standing.

"So that's the way you want to play, huh?" The witch asked. "Very well. Once I'm done with you, I'll stuff you so much that you will be begging me to stop."

The witch then conjured a large variety of sweets. From whole pies to high stacked cakes. Even with there empty stomachs, they may not be able to handle it. They had to act fast and give the witch a decisive blow. So....
1111121111211111111111111111.title: Reach for his digestion potion.

choices: Decides to set up camp for the night.
11111211112111111111111111112.content:
Something occurred to Polly. She was an old-time witch. That means that she had old-time weaknesses. And what's the one weakness of witches? Water!

"Oh! Duh!" Polly said to herself. Polly see waves her wand and summon up a water spell. "Hey hag, take this!!!"

Polly then splashed a wave of water on the witch. As expected, it seem to work on her.

"Gaaah!!!!!" The witch shouted. She then started to melt. "Nooooo! Noooo! I'm melting! MELTING!!! WHAT A WORLD!!!"

Witch chiches aside, the witch turned to vapor and the only things left behind were her robes and hat. The battle was over and the witch was gone.

"She gone... we did it." William said relieved.
"Who would have guess that would actually work?" Polly asked before chuckling a bit. "Good thing I know water spells."
"Good thing." Tyson said. "Now take her hat for proof of her defeat while I free this dragon lady."
"Alright." Polly said doing what Tyson told her.

Tyson then broke down the cage that the silver dragon was in. She fell to the ground and that woke her up. The silver dragon were a female warrior outfit that opposed her belly. She also was slightly smaller than the others.

"Oww!!!! That hurt!" The dragoness went while rubbing her tush. "Wait. I'm free?"
"Yeah! The witch is gone." William said.
"Oh. Thank goodness. I thought this was gonna be the day I get eaten for sure." The dragoness said looking relieved and getting up.

As she said that, the whole place started to crumble.

"What's happening?" Polly said sounding frantic.
"The witch is gone and her whole place is crumbling with it." Tyson explained.
"We need to move. FAST!!!" Will shouted out.
"At our weight, I don't think we can make it." Polly stated still feeling bloated.
"Then we'll make a new exit." Tyson said boldly.

Tyson then chopped at the gingerbread walls with his ax. Making a way to the outside. They all then go out the hole as fast as they could and get as far from the house they could. Once they all made it out, the house completely fell down and was covered in green flames. The whole thing burned down and there was nothing left of the house. Just an empty spot on the ground where it use to be.

"Looks like we made BARELY made it out." Will said relieved.
"Yeah. By... the end of our tails." Polly said breathing heavily with the witch's hat on.

Seems like the group's mission was complete. They even saved someone.from a terrible fate. After such a battle, the group...
11111211112111111111111111112.title: Polly took the witch out with a water spell.

111112111122.content:
William decided to go to the grocery store, and was quite happy with his choice. The store had a good selection of food for him to choose from, and a second, smaller area with a few items. Wondering if he'd find anything useful, he decided to check it out.

"Lookie what we have here!", he thought when he reached the table. There sat a small basket of the stretchy fruit and three bottles of Polly's diet potion! Will decided to ask about them to the kindly shopkeeper, a squirrel. "Oh, those? Well, the fruit comes off a tree in the back, but we get those potions from a local girl. Have you seen her? She's a pretty young thing, a white rabbit with blonde hair. She stops by twice a week and drops them off."

"So Polly got the fruit here, but she makes the potions," Will realized. "Hey, she must be a pretty good witch if she can do that!" He caught himself thinking about her longer than normal, but realized why with a smile.

Then he thought about her recent weight gain, and how she wanted him to get fatter too, at least, you know, that time she literally fattened him up. "Should I surprise her?", he thought. "I do have the gold..."
111112111122.title: Grocery store.

1111121111221.content:
Will decided if she wanted him fatter, then she'd see him fatter. As a result, he bought two of the fruit and two of the potions from the shopkeeper, which set him back 50 gold. "Of course, I still have 150 gold left over," he thought to himself, "so I'm still fine." Remembering the wolf had suggested he get bigger too, he decided to go for it. He went straight for the sweets, asking the baker to load up two whole cakes - round, double-layered and more than 18 inches across - as well as four fried chickens and a jug of wine. After this splurge, which cost him another 58 gold (still had 92, though!), he left the store, struggling to carry everything, until he found a quiet clearing in a back alley.

Will started his feast by eating one of the fruits, immediately feeling his stomach gain a rubbery feeling that left him at first nauseous, then hungry. It was time to begin.

The huge battle took nearly an hour, but with a few last gasps, Will managed to choke down the last piece of cake, having completed it, and two of the chickens, and half of the wine. His belly had grown massive during his eating binge, now hanging over his crossed legs a little bit, and he laid back, gasping with joy at the full sensation. Then with shock, as that situation grew critical. It seemed the fruit was wearing off, and the amount of food Will ate would burst his stomach if he ate it normally. He quickly grabbed the potion and chugged it down, then rubbed his aching gut before it suddenly began shrinking. It still held on to about three more inches of flab, but the rest of the food spread throughout his body, fattening his arms, legs, chest and even his neck - he knew he had a double-chin now. He'd probably gained close to 50 pounds just now, climbing up to 300 total.
1111121111221.title: Yes! Big surprise!

11111211112211.content:
Will still had a cake, two chickens and half a jug of wine left, and decided since he'd bought all that food, he might as well take care of it now. He stretched, then unceremoniously ate the second stretchy fruit, immediately feeling the nausea, then hunger, return. He greedily dug into the second cake, moving on to the chicken and wine faster this time. It took him five fewer minutes to finish his second huge meal, and after he hurried up and drank his second potion, the results again distributed themselves all over his body, puffing him onward and outward up to 350 pounds.

After taking a few minutes to readjust to his new, bigger body, Will went to find Polly, but to his surprise...
11111211112211.title: Do it again.

11111212.content:
Walking back to the village, the lush green forest was filled with birds singing and beautiful sunlight. William couldn't keep his eyes off of Polly's newfound mass. Her belly, boobs, and ass swayed and jiggled with every step she took. William blushed madly as he stared at Polly. Polly noticed and simply smiled as she slapped her ass giving it a slight jiggle. William looked away blushing madly before Polly tugged on his shirt.
"Like what you see handsome?" Polly said seductively.
William simply blushed and tried to look away before he noticed something. A semi large slime was slowly moving towards them and he got an idea.
"Maybe if you were a little bigger I would like what I saw." William shot back pointing at the slime.
Polly decided to...
11111212.title: Face a giant slime monster.

choices: Take the risk. Get the items
Move on. It's not worth it.
Surprise! The vines got the jump on William.
112.content:
William just sat there and watched as the bunny girl continued to expand and expand. Her clothes began to rip and her skin begin to stretch to its limit. Suddenly, BOOM! She popped like a balloon, leaving no trace that she was there at all except for some syrup left on the ground and a couple of items. He was sort of concerned about her, but he knew that she didn't die just now. She'll be revived at the nearest church, probably a lot thinner then when she started off.

Now, the question is, will William take the risk and go over near the vines to collect her dropped items, or will he just move on?
112.title: ...Loser.

choices: He gets grabbed by the vines
1121.content: Quickly, William jumped towards the equipment and prepared for the vines to attack. They did, but the fox slashed them and grabbed the items. Running outside of the vines grip, William looked over the items he obtained. But before he could do anything, ...
1121.title: Take the risk. Get the items

11211.content: A soft rustle interrupts William's investigation of the items, forcing him to put them in his bag as he turns around, seeing a somewhat familiar looking figure in the distance as it walks towards him. Looking around, he decides to....
11211.title: Who's there?

choices: Wait a little to figure out what's happening
112111.content:
Putting caution to the wind, William decides to go towards the figure, who was also doing the same. The shadows from the canopy don't help on making the figure any more visible, until he was a few feet from it, or rather, her.

A beautiful fox was on the other side of the clearing, smiling lightly to him. She was somewhat Orange, at least from what he could see over her leafy gown and vine crown on top of her head. Looking down he could see that she was a mix of apple and pear shaped, her tummy rounding up forward before ending in another curve where her butt is. Her paws were neatly crossed and stepped, obviously not any fighting stance, yet William felt like something was off about her, was she a native?

The dryad giggles softly, the winds echoing her voice in the trees around William as she then closes her eyes and began to sing. The fox had no idea what was going on, but could feel a strange feeling go over him, his tummy gurgling a little while he started to feel a little fuller. He rubs his nose as it felt a tingle, only to see that his muzzle was turning blue when he crossed his eyes! He takes a few steps back, surprised as he tried to figure out what to do....
112111.title: A fruit dryad!

1121111.content:
William clutches his sword as he starts charging towards the figure. With a battle cry, he swings right to the other fox, only to hear a 'CLING' come from his weapon. Looking down, he saw his sword, which was stuck into a tree, the dryad missing from that spot. Turning around, he could see the fox gently swaying to the other side of him, not stopping her hymn.

William clutched his tummy as he felt it gurgle and bubble, putting a hand over it, only to feel it push right back! The fox staggers back a little as he looks down in surprise at his swelling tummy, which was also starting to gain a blue tint as he looks at the dryad, "You! Change me back!" he commands, however the dryad did not respond with anything, staying in her hypnotic melody as William continues to bloat up.

He pries his sword free, losing some precious time doing so, and gets ready to charge again. His valiant charge was soon turning into an awkward waddle as the juices inside of him slosh and multiply inside of him. By the time he reaches her, his tummy was already bloated to the size of a beach ball, feeling quite full, and he was so slow at swinging the dryad had no trouble dodging out of the way from him. He continues to swing, at least trying to break her concentration before she opens her eyes and makes her tone more innocent. William felt himself freeze before swinging the creature, staring in her large eyes, before dropping his sword and falling forward onto his tummy, which continues to fill out like a water balloon...
1121111.title: Charmed and heavy

11211112.content:
William felt his body give out, leaving him no more control within his vessel. The inflating continued inside of the fox, and he was lifted into the air by his gigantic, swollen gut. He looked around, but couldn't see the dryad anywhere. She had to be nearby, he knew, because his growth seemed to become faster.

His swollen limbs stuck out straight as they began diminishing into the large blue ball that peeked over the treetops. Will clenched his teeth. His skin was very tight, and had to give out eventually. His neck sunk into the ball, leaving the fox's final form a violet sphere with four divots along it and a tiny fox head on top. Trees were crushed under his mass, stabbing him with sharp, wooden sticks.

Pain covered his entire body, and it slightly worsened when he felt a sudden pair of paws walking along his backside. The dryad, he assumed, then flopped across his flesh, adding more pressure to William. He could tell his head began to become absorbed when his ears were forced down, and a blue rim filled his vision. Tears streamed down his cheeks as the last of his sight was abruptly removed by the fatness.

He met his demise when a quick, cold, steel blade stabbed his back. He exploded outwards, covering the forest in a tidal wave of blueberry juice. The dryad was nowhere to be seen as it all happened, and neither could William's belongings.

The fox gasped and sat up, being greeted by the peaceful sight of the closest church. He exhaled, wiping sweat from his brow. He forgot that he would just respawn here after death. He looked over his naked body, knowing that he just lost his entire inventory, clothes and all. Laying back down, William groaned in anger.

He went searching for his supplies again in the Forest, but couldn't find the dryad anywhere. Days went by, and the fox eventually gave up. His first fight was a failure, leaving him bare and unable to continue. If only you, the reader, could of chosen him a better fate, then maybe this wouldn't of happened. Good thing there's a thing called the back button!
11211112.title: Resign (Pop and Reform)

11213.content:
While William was looking through the loot left over from that unfortunate traveler, he didn't hear the sound of another fur charging towards him. Without notice, something slammed hard into William, knocking him away and causing him slid along the forest floor for several feet.

It was only a few moments later that William regained his senses and saw what tackled him. Several feet away from him, searching through the exploded adventurer's satchel, was a fur. It was a hugely obese deer. The fur stood around six feet tall but easily weighed five hundred pounds. His white, furry belly stuck out far and hung down to his thunder thighs. Two pillowly pecs rested on the top of his gut and sagged down due to gravity. The deer's thighs were easily as big around as William's waist, yet the deer's calves were heavily muscled due, most likely, to having to carry around all that weight. The fur's behind was roughly the size of two basketballs, and in conjunction with his back rolls, the deer's fluffy tail was almost surrounded in adipose. It was at this moment that William realized the deer was nude, though the other fur's apron of a gut meant that he didn't need anything to cover up his front.

William saw the bloated deer pick through the pack and giggle to himself as he examined each item he found. The deer closed up the bag and started to waddle away with the loot that was so rightfully your's.
11213.title: Someone, or something, tackles Willian

112131.content:
"Hey! Fatass! Give me back my stuff!" William yelled after he picked himself off the ground and brushed himself off. The hugely flabby deer turned around to face William, his belly and chest continued to wobble for a moment after he stopped moving.

"Oh, look! The runt of a fox is back up!" the deer said. "If you want this stuff, come get it!"

William grabbed his sword off the ground and charged towards the wide deer. When he was feet away from the fur, the chunky deer tossed the satchel right at William's face. Caught off guard, the fox dropped his sword to catch the bag. He looked down in bewilderment at the sack only to look back up and see the deer charging at him. Before he could respond, the deer had used his massive weight to send William flying back several feet, knocking him senseless once again.

When William awoke, the fat deer was lying on top of him covering the slender fox's body entirely in flab. William struggled to get loose, but the useless flailing of his arms and legs only sent ripples through the deer's chubby body.

"I think I won this round, foxy." the deer said smuggly.

"Get...off...me!" William struggled to say.

"Nope! Not until you've had your surprise!" The deer pulled from the satchel a glass vial. In it was a bright yellow fluid. "This was the only thing in that girl's bag that I didn't know what it was. And, well, since I have you here..." He pulled the cork from the vial. William clamped down this muzzle, but the deer held a thick paw over the deer's nose. A few moments later, William was forced to open his maw for air. The deer took his opportunity to shove the vial into the deer's mouth.

What did the liquid do to William?
112131.title: Hot Pursuit

choices: Live in the wilderness with the deer and learn his ways
112132.content:
William pretended that he was still knocked out as he watched the swollen deer waddle into the forest, each plodding step sending a shock wave throughout his flabby body with his tremendous, bare butt shaking uncontrollably. When the deer was a considerable distance away, our adventurer hopped back to his feet and followed the fatter fur making sure to keep far enough away from the deer so that if he were to make any noise he would be noticed yet close enough to track him.

The fox followed the deer for a couple of hours. There were a few dicey moments where William was sure that he would be spotted, but the deer never turned around to look to see if anything was following him. Rather, the immense deer kept marching deeper and deeper into the woods.

The deer entered clearing in the forest and, when he suddenly stopped, William dived into a shrub a hundred feet behind him. The fox spied on the deer, trying to see what had startled him. He watched as the chubby, white deer stood still for a few moments and then saw something out of William's range of sight. The deer bent down as well as his rotund belly would let him and he picked up a stone from the ground, reeled back his arm, and chucked the rock into the treeline.

Suddenly, a lone Syrup Vine came charging towards the deer, who remained unmoved until the creature was inches away. With lightening speed, the deer grabbed the Vine by it's main stalk and twist and bent it's body in half. In a loud crunch, the Syrup Vine was defeated, brown thick liquid poured from where the deer snapped it in half. The deer then stuck the cracked body into his mouth and started sucking the juice from the Vine. A second Vine appeared from the bushed on the deer's right, charging towards him also. In another lightening quick attack, the deer broke its body in half as syrup dripped from its wounds.

"Hungry?" The deer held out the second Syrup Vine in his hand. William dug himself in deeper into his shrub. Who was the deer talking to?

The deer looked over his shoulder right in the direction where William was hiding. "I said, are you hungry?" he asked again. William didn't move a muscle.

The deer turned around and starting waddling towards where William was hiding. Drops of syrup had fallen onto his hefty chest. "Okay, you can stop hiding now. I can see you. You're an orange fox in a green bush. You don't exactly blend it."

William pulled himself from the shrub, brushing a few leaves of his clothing. "Did you know I was following you?"

"Oh yeah. You're not the most stealthy fox around." He held out his hand with the second broken Syrup Vine out to William. "Go ahead, take it. They're delicious." William grabbed the defeated creature from the deer and stuck the broken part of its main vine into his mouth and started sucking. The taste of the Vine's syrup was divine. The fox closed his eyes, and just focused on sucking and tasting the heavenly liquid. Sweet, surgery fluid flowed down the fox's throat into in awaiting belly, putting him into a state of ecstasy that was only interrupted when the Vine had dried up.

"Oh my God, that was great..." said William, opening his eyes slowly.

"Good, but don't move a muscle." the deer said. He was clearly looking at something over the fox's shoulder. William heard that particular rustling of leaves and root. Another Syrup Vine. He felt a vine grab his leg, and another grab his arm. The mass of vines and leaves pulled itself onto William's shoulder. A lone vine reached across William's face sticking it's tip into his mouth.

Another lightening quick move from the deer. William hardly saw him swiftly reach to the fox's shoulder and snap the Vine in half, killing it like that last two.

"You see, these things aren't too hard to kill if you know what you're doing. And if they're alone. If they're in a pack, you're screwed." Once again, he offered the Vine to you. "You seem to really like these things! Go ahead and have it. I already had six of those for breakfast."

William snatched the Vine out of the deer's plump fingers and sucked its syrup out. "Thanks! You had six of these today? Do you live nearby here or something?" the fox said between drinking out the liquid.

"Oh, yeah. I live here. All over here." the deer broadly waved his bulky arm gesturing towards the entire woods. "I just live out here in forest. Most furs live in the city, but I can't stand that life anymore. Wake up, eat, work, eat, sleep, repeat. I just so sick of it. So one day, I left my day, wandered into these woods, and I've been living here ever since."

"And you like it?" said William, his fox tail wagging happily thanks to the Syrup Vine.

"The years I've lived in these woods have been some of the best years of my life! I wake up when I want, eat what I want, go where I want to go!"

"And eat a dozen of these delicious vines everyday?" William asked excitedly.

The deer laughed causing his flabby body to wobble. "Well, I try not to eat that many a day. Those things are pretty fatty." William froze for a second, he had nearly finished the second vine. "Oh, calm down. It's not like you'll look like me tomorrow. But if you go crazy with them, you will. I wasn't always this big, but for my first few weeks out here, I only eat those vines and, well..." He placed a paw on his paunch. "I guess this was bound to happen. Nearly all the wild food out here is very caloric. Not like I care. It's not like I'm trying to stay being a skinny deer or fit into tiny clothing anymore."

"Or any clothing for that matter..." William's eyes wandered towards the deer's waist.

He laughed again. "Why bother? Everything down there is covered up by my belly. And nobody has complained about seeing my bubble butt. You hardly said anything and you were watching it for nearly two hours!"

The fox blushed. He just finished the second vine. "So, do you think you can show me cool tricks about how to survive out here? I'm trying to become an adventurer and learning how to survive out in the wilderness is something that would be really helpful to me."

The deer thought for a moment. "Look, you're clearly a city fox. And the things I know can't be learned overnight. The only reason I know what I know is because my father was a survivalist and taught me what I know. So, yeah, I can teach you, but you'd have to live out here with me for a while. I don't mind the company."
112132.title: Follow the Fat Deer

1121321.content:
"I can do it," began William. "I don't mind living out here for a while. And it'll be worth it to learn how to survive out here as an adventure!"

"Excellent!" the enormous deer said. He stuck out his paw. "Derrick, by the way."

The fox shook his paw. "William. Oh, and sorry for following you back there."

"Yeah, I was wondering about that. I don't know why you were following me. There wasn't anything that exploded traveler had on her that was useful."

"Oh, oh well. So when do we start?"

A rustle came from the shrubs off to the duo's right.

The deer smirked. "We can start right now."
1121321.title: Accept the Deer's offer

choices: "Berries. Specifically, the ones not to eat."
"Local herbs, and how to mix them into health potions."
11213212.content:
As the sun rose in the east, rising about the local treeline, rays of light soaked William's face and he was gently woken up. He had only been in the wilderness for a month and he loved waking up this way. It was far more peaceful and quite than being awoken by a loud, annoying cuckoo clock. The fox sat up in his hammock and stretched out his arms, swung his legs out, and got himself out of his makeshift bed. One of the first lessons Derrick had taught William was how to construct a hammock out of the tall grasses and leaves.

The orange fox continued to stretch his body out. Derrick had told him about this. If he started the day with stretches, he'll be limber all day long. He shook his arms loose, did some torso twists, warmed up his knees, and tried doing toe touches.

This was becoming a problem.

Derrick wasn't lying about how fattening the local flora and fauna was. Syrup Vines aside, even things like berries and leaves were extremely caloric. But it was either fatty food or no food out here. As a result, William estimated that he had put on easily 75 pounds in the first month out in the wilderness. Most of the calories went to his belly, where it stuck out a foot and was soft and plush like a sack full of bread dough. It hung ever so slightly over itself and was starting to be effected by gravity. The rest of his body thickened up only slightly. His rump had also taken up a considerable amount of the new weight. William was more aware of its roundness and how much it now jiggled. Although this was mostly known to him from Derrick's comments.

The fox looked back to his hammock and saw the leather article handing off of one of the ropes. It was a makeshift loincloth. Derrick didn't need one thanks to how low his gut hanged. But that wasn't the case for William. "And it won't be," he had thought to himself. "Once I'm out of there, all this weight will melt right off." Nevertheless, he didn't want to strut around in the nude, so he made something to cover this naughty areas. William wasn't self-conscious about about his rump though. If Derrick didn't mind the fox seeing his gigantic rump, then William didn't feel the need to cover his behind. And William didn't mind seeing that deer-butt.

After donning the loincloth, William wandered over to a nearby fruit bush that Derrick had taught his bore nutritious, non-poisonous berries. Perhaps, berries is not the right word, being that each was the size of an apple but had the texture and color of a grape. "A few of these will make a pretty good breakfast." Derrick had told him. William grabbed three and started to gobble them down. Just as he finished the last one, he heard the rustling of leaves behind him and turned around.

Syrup Vines. Two of them.

They hadn't spotted William yet, so he was able to get a sneak attack in on them. He had snapped one of them in half before the other noticed. The second Vine started to wrap itself about the fox's right arm, but he was able to reach just the right spot on the vine ("Always right below the major leaf formations," Derrick taught him) and snapped it.

Pleased with himself, William rolled onto his back and started sucking on both of the vines at the same time. Despite having easily drank the cores of a hundred Vines by now, each sip was just like the first, transporting him back to a state of pure ecstasy. He shut his eyes tight and let the syrup fill his belly with bliss.

When he sucked the vines dry, his belly felt close to bursting. That didn't bother William; it was worth it. His eyes opened and standing about him was Derrick in all his obese deer glory. These shared a moment awkward silence, but then they both begun to laugh out loud. The deer reached out a thick paw and helped up William to his feet.

"Two at a time, now?" asked Derrick.

"Hey, I'm just bulking up for winter!" joked William, giving his taunt belly a slow rub.

"Yeah, I used that excuse too," said Derrick. "Four winters ago."

"Well, I guess it just shows that I'm better at catching Syrup Vines that you!" William stuck his tongue out at Derrick.

"Watch it. I could you into a full Syrup Vine nest and see how you'll do." joked Derrick.

"Syrup Vine...nests?"

"Yeah, I thought I told you this. There are several major nests in the world that all Syrup Vines come from. You see, for a new Syrup Vine to form, it must first..."

At this point, William just tuned out. "There are NESTS of these things?" he thought to himself. "How many of them are there at any given nest? Dozens? Hundreds? ...thousands?" He started fantasizing about being thrown into one. The poor, orange fox being swarmed by thousands of those creatures, each shoving a vine into his mouth, depositing their sickly sweet syrup into his mouth. "They'd overwhelm me," William thought, "I'll be surrounded by those things and all I could do in drink in that wonderful syrup of theirs..." He thought about hundreds of Vines draining themselves into him. A few dozen of them alone would turn him into a completely spherical fox, limbs all swallowed up with fat. All the rest would just grow him even bigger, turning him into a massive, orange furry globe. A fox as big as a home, and just getting larger, stuffed full of more syrup, until-

"Excited much?" asked Derrick.

William snapped out of his trance. "Huh? What do you mean?" Derrick's eyes shot down briefly to the fox's loincloth, which now resembled a tent. William blushed a deep red and tried pulling down the small patch of leather covering his manhood.

Derrick laughed at this. "Oh, relax. We're both guys." The deer said. "It's better to take care of that in the morning. You don't want to feel all worked up down there when you're being chased by a patch of direwolves."

William wanted to desperately change the subject. "So, what's there to learn today?" he asked.
11213212.title: A month of training later

112132121.content:
"Berries. Specifically, the ones not to eat."

"Are there a lot of poisonous berries around here?" asked William.

"In these woods? Not really. But it's probably useful to point out which of the few are. Also, I'll show you some of the other kinds of vegetation in the area. Some of them have rather...interesting properties. So, grab your things and we'll head out!"

William returned to his "camp". It's only a camp in name only since the fox hardly had any possessions these days. Derrick lives with hardly anything and he thrives out in the forest, and that was the experience William wanted. Apart from his hammock, there wasn't much aside from a small leather satchel he made out of his old clothes, the same clothes he crafted his loincloth from.

The fox rejoined the deer, and the two starting hiking north along a dirt path that followed a nearby river. It took two hours of walking before getting to the part of the woods that Derrick said was crammed full of berry bushes. William was impressed with the deer's stamina. The fur was probably a quarter ton of fat, though he never specifically asked. He doubted that Derrick either knew or cared about the specific amount of pounds he was hauling. Yet he was able to hike the entire way without a single rest. William, on the other hand, had a harder time with the trip. Being a city fox, he was not used to the exercise. In conjunction with the pudgy gut he was now sporting, he found most physical activity more difficult than usual.

The duo spent several hours in the berry-rich sector of the woods. There, Derrick taught William about all sorts of berries. There were the black ones with red speckles. "Don't eat those. Very poisonous." There were the red ones with black speckles. "Not poisonous, but you won't have fun for the next few hours after eating them." One bush bore round, bright green fruit. "Tasty, but not as good as the ones back home." And so on.

Though William was pleased with all of the knowledge about berries he acquired during the hike, he was getting exhausted and didn't even want to think about the two hour hike back. "Hey Derrick, when can we rest? I really need a break."

"Follow me," said Derrick, "There's just one more bush to show you, then we'll rest." The fox followed the deer until they came across a short shrub with several dozen grape-sized berries on it. What immediately struck William was the marbled white and grey coloring on the berry. He had never seen a fruit like that in nature which such a beautiful color combination.

Derrick plucked a single berry off of a branch with his pudgy fingers and tossed it to William. The fox popped it into his mouth and chomped down hard on it. Suddenly, William felt surge of water pressure in his mouth and he was force to open his muzzle as what looked to be about a gallon of clear, sweet-smelling fluid ran down his mouth, chest, and belly.

The deer was doubled over in laughter. "What the hell was that?" yelled William.

"Sorry, but I just had to. You know how plants store energy in their berries. See, this one is super effective at doing so, and it's able to cram way more juice into a single berry than most plants. And with more juice, there are more nutriants. That's why I wanted to bring you here for our break. Just eating one of these babies will perk you right back up!"

"Okay," said William, "but how am I supposed to eat it if it explodes when I chew it?"

"Oh yeah, the same thing happened to me the first time I ate one. But it's a simple solution. All you need to do is swallow one whole like a pill." The deer plucked another fruit off a branch, popped it into his mouth, and swallowed. "Delicious!"

William grabbed a berry for himself and tossed it into his awaiting mouth. The moment the berry arrived at his stomach, William felt a huge surge of pressure in his belly as if someone had shoved a water hose down his throat and turned it on full blast until the fox was full. He had seen his belly immediately swell up several inches, his gut sagging a bit more under the weight of the contents of his belly.

"Woah! What happened?" asked William, rubbing his bloated gut.

"It's the berry juice! It's surprising at first, but that's just the juice bursting out of the berry. But how do you feel?"

"Aside from bloated as hell, I feel surprising rejuvenated..."

The deer smiled. "That's thanks to the juice."

"But how come you didn't swell up like I did when I ate one?"

"I did. You just can't notice it until all this bulk." Derrick ran a paw along the curve of his massive, cream-colored belly. "And now you're recharge, let head back." Derrick waddled past the fox back into the direction from where they came.

"Wait, why aren't we taking a bunch of these?" William posed.

"We can't take many more. That shrub is very delicate: If you take too many, the poor thing will die. And it's a rare plant, so it dying is the last thing I want to happen."

"Oh...okay," William replied. "Hey, I'll catch up with you in a minute. I suddenly have to go to the bathroom because, well..." William gave his enlarged guy a jiggle.

The deer chuckled. "Oh yeah, alright. I'll wait for you down the road." The rotund fur waddled down the road until he was out of sight. William turned to the bush, eyeing the amazing fruit.

"I can take a few," he thought. "A few shouldn't hurt..."
112132121.title: Blubbery Berry Hunting

1121321212.content:
When his portly deer companion was out of sight, William grabbed a dozen berries off the bush. There were still plenty left over, so that shouldn't do any harm to the plant itself, right? The fox shoved them into his leather pouch and ran ahead to catch up with Derrick.

The two made their way back to their respective camps several hours later. It was already dusk when they arrived, so Derrick wished William off and headed back to his camp. William returned to his camp. When he got there, he collapsed onto his hammock. Although these berry were especially good with providing nutrients to the eater, it didn't help with the feeling of exhaustion that the fox felt after having hiked for several hours. He hoped onto his hammock and took off his leather satchel and loincloth, hanging them off of one of the hammock's support lines.

The fox closed his eyes and tried going to sleep. But as he tried to sleep, a rumbling came from his stomach. Because of his late return from the hike, William had forgotten to eat anything for dinner. He reached for his leather satchel and clawed through it for some edible berries.

But he had pulled out two of the grey-white berries that he pocketed earlier in the day. "Well, I don't want to eat a full meal right now, so these should do." He popped two berries into his mouth and swallowed them whole. Seconds later, his gut suddenly swollen up. This time, having eaten two berries, William's gut was easily a few feet in diameter. His skin groaned due to the pressure. William was shocked with how massive his gut suddenly gotten. His paws reached down and, after several minutes of careful massaging, the pain of his overstuffed belly started to fade, and William was able to relax into sleep with a full belly.

That is, until he heard a rip. The hammock had split open under the weight of the fox, and William came crashing down to the ground. William tired getting up, but his massive gut prevented him from doing so. So the fox dragged himself to a nearby tree where he leaned up against it, his gut spreading his legs around. Yet again, he rubbed his swollen gut until he finally feel asleep.

***

It was several days later and William had a new habit before bed. Each night, he would pop one or two of the special berries into his mouth and allow himself to be inflated with its berry juice. Then, he'd find a tree to lean against and sleep while his rubbed his swollen belly. His hammock no longer supported his weight.

Derrick had said that the fruit of the special bush was very nutritious, and William found that out firsthand. Thanks to his new habits, his weight swiftly increased. In the matter of a few weeks, the fox easily put on another fifty pounds which filled out his orange-colored belly as well as his buttocks. William was largely unaware of his weight gain aside from the new tightness of his loincloth around his waist. The thin leather strap of it reaching around his waist was starting to be covered with over-following flab.

That morning, William awoke with Derrick, the obese deer, was standing over him.

"Remember that bush we visited last week? The one with those special berries?"

"The grey and white ones? Yeah, what about it?" asked William.

"I was around that area yesterday and noticed that the bush had a lot less berries than usual."

"Oh, did it?" asked William, nervously.

"Yeah, I mean, the wildlife could have started eating it, but that's usual. Did you take any berries from it?"

"Oh, no!" lied William, "I didn't! I don't want that plant to die!"

"Okay, I'll believe you. But I just want to ask because those berries have a nasty side effect."

"Wait, what? I ate one of those berries and you're now telling me that there are side effects?"

"The side effects don't take effect if you eat only one or two." Derrick said. "It's when you eat a lot more of them that problems start to happen. Because if you eat too many..."
1121321212.title: A dozen will do you

choices: Derrick forces William to keep hiking
112132122.content:
"I'll be showing you about all of the local herbs in the area. There are some really helpful ones out here that can help you out in a pinch. I'll probably only be able to show you the ones that are best for healing cuts and wounds, but I can show you some of the other special herbs around here another day."

***

The duo spend the day hiking around the wilderness. Derrick pointed out flowering herbs and their properties. The white herb with light green leaves could be used to clean any cuts, William learned. The obese deer took a handful in his paw and tore open the leaves with his plump fingers. A clear, thick liquid poured out of them. It smelled like medicine. William found out that the bright pink leaves he frequently saw in the woods could be sucked on to help relieve indigestion. Munching on a few of them will aide any kind of stomach ache. And the light purple leaves, Derrick said, could be used to help with a headache. Rip open a few leaves, dab some of the fluid onto your muzzle, and the smell will sooth you.

The sun was starting to set off in the eat. "We should head back soon." said Derrick. "I'm not too familiar with these parts of the woods, so I don't want to be stuck out here at night."

The two headed back to their familiar parts of the woods. It was only a few minutes into their hike back when William's legs began to burn and ache. He had been walking for hours all day and the fox was almost too exhausted to move.

"Hey Derrick," William said in between pants. "Can we rest for a bit? I'm really tired from all the hiking we've done today."

"I mean, we can rest for a bit. But if we wait too long, then we'll be stuck out here and have to camp."

"I really need a break." William started rubbing his bare thighs. "My legs are on fire and I don't think I can take another step..."

"Alright, alright. But no more than fifteen minutes, okay?" William slowly plodding over to a nearby fallen log and sat himself on the ground, his back leaning against it and his hefty gut now resting on his lap. The fox's legs immediately felt better and he sighed in relief.

The obese deer joined William by the log. Derrick slowly lower his massive bulk down to the ground, and when his rump finally landed on the ground, William swore that the ground shook.

"How do you do it?" asked William.

"What do you mean?" the deer replied.

"You're like, what? Two or three times bigger than I am?" The fox eyed the deer's gigantic gut which occupied nearly all of his lap reaching to his knees. Two pillow-sized moobs rested on top of the doughy mound. Derrick looked down at his gut and playfully gave it a slap sending a jiggle throughout. "You're huge. But you have no problems getting around. But back in the cities, I've seen furs as big as you who can't go a few feet without breaking a sweat. What gives?"

"You think this is all flab?" the deer smirked. He flexed his bicep and held it up for William. "Here, feel this." The fox pressed a paw into the deer's arm. It sunk down slightly, but William could feel rock hard muscle under it. "I used to be a trim, muscular deer before I got out here. Solid muscle and not an ounce of fat on me. That was thanks to the job I had in the shipyards lifting cargo. But when I go out here, I cut loose. I ate what I want, whenever I wanted. Heck, I think I spent a solid week sucking on Syrup Vines. I seriously ballooned up. Less than a year of being out in the wilderness and all the fatty flora and fauna got me to the size I am today. One day, I realized that I needed to slow down. If I kept my eating up, half of the forest would be completely bare and I'd be two ton of deer."

"As opposed to the one ton of deer you are now?" joked William.
